name: Creamy Whipped Feta Dip
author: JENNY231
summary: An easy, delicious, and versatile recipe that can be made with low-fat cream cheese and milk. Use less milk for a spread and more milk for a dipping consistency. Serve with crudites, plain rice crackers, toasted pita wedges, or kettle chips.
ingredients: 9 ounces cream cheese, at room temperature
1 tablespoon milk, or more as needed
directions: Beat cream cheese and feta cheese together in a bowl until combined
Add milk slowly, mixing until desired consistency is reached
Cover and refrigerate for 30 minutes or until ready to serve
Remove from the refrigerator a few minutes before serving to soften slightly
